title: Final Section
text: This final section is the core of the experiment. We appreciate you filling it out completely and with some thought. We know it will take your attention and consideration so we are trying to pay you well. Depending on your choices, you will earn between $15 and $20 for 5-10 minutes of time. Thank you for being conscientious.

title: 45 Choices
text: You will be asked to make a series of similar choices. For those who complete all 45 choices conscientiously, we will randomly select one of your decisions and pay you according to the choice you made.

title: Splitting Tokens
text: The choices are organized into 9 different tabs. Each tab has five lines. Each line is a separate choice where you will be asked to split 50 tokens between the left and the right boxes.

title: Two Dates
text: For each choice, you will be presented with two dates: an early date on the left that might be today or just a few weeks from now, and a later date on the right that is months in the future. We will pay you on both of the dates for whichever line is randomly selected for payment. But your choices will determine how much of that payment comes on the early date and how much is delayed until the later date.

title: Token Values
text: You make this determination by splitting 50 tokens between the early date and the late date. Tokens put on the later date are always worth 20 cents each. Tokens put on the early date are worth less. How much less varies from line to line. The value is listed next to the box.

title: Lines and Token Values
text: Each line is a separate decision. Looking at the top line, you can see that for each token you allocate to the left box, you would be paid 19 cents on October 22nd. For each token you allocate to the right box, you will be paid 20 cents, but not until November 22nd. Late tokens are always worth 20 cents each. The value for early tokens changes with each line.

title: Worth the Wait?
text: It is for you to decide whether the higher value is worth the wait. You can put none, some, or all of the tokens at the early date. The program will automatically make sure the two boxes add up to 50 and it will automatically do the calculation to show how much money you would receive on each date based on your current choices if this line is selected.

title: Tabs and Dates
text: There are nine tabs, listed above the calendars. Each tab has a different set of early and late payment dates. The tab currently selected is highlighted in blue and shows the early date is January 31st (today) and the later date is February 28th. The calendars help you visualize when you would receive the money. The early and late dates are circled with the interval in between highlighted. Today's date is lightly circled.

title: Navigating and Submitting
text: You can navigate back and forth between the tabs. When you are finished, click the button at the bottom to submit all of your decisions. You must make a choice in all decisions before you can submit. We appreciate your taking this seriously and hope the money is worth a few moments of your attention

title: Payment
text: After you submit, one of your 45 lines will be chosen at random. You will be paid based on your choices for this line. You will also receive an extra $5 thank you on each of the two dates. Payments will be Amazon gift cards emailed to the address you submitted. Your total across the two dates will be between $15 and $20. The gift cards will be sent on the day in question. If the line selected for you includes todayâ€™s date, you will receive a gift card today. We have made all promised payments to earlier participants. Thank you for your time.
